mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS (PROD_ID, ID, CATEGORY_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_IMG, PROD_PRICE, PROD_COLOR, PROD_OP, PROD_DESC) VALUES (#{prod_id}, #{id}, #{category_id}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_img}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_color}, #{prod_op}, #{prod_desc})

INSERT INTO Used_Products (used_id, id, used_title, used_content, used_price, used_location, used_img) VALUES (used_products_seq.nextval,#{id}, #{used_title}, #{used_content}, #{used_price}, #{used_location}, #{used_img})
